医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI 驱动的葡萄糖分析：GPT-4 带来了希望，但仍有改进的空间GPT-4 展示了其在分析连续血糖监测数据、提供准确指标和摘要方面的潜力，同时突出了糖尿病护理中需要改进的领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-powered-glucose-analysis-GPT-4-offers-promise-with-room-for-refinement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-powered-glucose-analysis-GPT-4-offers-promise-with-room-for-refinement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dd394ff-b8de-4859-8310-65779cfeaca0 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 23:51:00 -0500 AI-powered glucose analysis: GPT-4 offers promise with room for refinement
儿童早期感染会带来长期健康风险儿童早期感染会显着增加儿童后期严重感染和抗生素使用的风险，凸显了早期预防和监测的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Early-infections-in-childhood-drive-long-term-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Early-infections-in-childhood-drive-long-term-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edd02cea-4ad5-49d4-9b56-1a899571c5de Wed, 08 Jan 2025 23:30:00 -0500 Early infections in childhood drive long-term health risks
科学家发现启动细胞自噬的关键因素我们的细胞随时都在进行回收：在一个称为自噬的过程中，不再需要的细胞成分被膜包围并分解成基本的构建块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Scientists-uncover-key-factors-for-starting-autophagy-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Scientists-uncover-key-factors-for-starting-autophagy-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e9dd959-13d4-4299-aace-bac4715a01d2 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:59:00 -0500 Scientists uncover key factors for starting autophagy in cells
间歇性禁食在控制肥胖和心血管健康方面显示出希望由格拉纳达大学 (UGR)、纳瓦拉公立大学 (UPNA) 和 CIBER 领导的科学家团队表明，间歇性禁食（减少摄入时间并延长每天禁食时间）是一种有效的方法。一种减肥方法并改善患有肥胖问题的人的心血管健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Intermittent-fasting-shows-promise-in-managing-obesity-and-cardioangio-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Intermittent-fasting-shows-promise-in-managing-obesity-and-cardioangio-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef4316b3-6575-41ae-974e-b7e3f388578c Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:44:22 -0500 Intermittent fasting shows promise in managing obesity and cardiovascular health
人工智能提高乳腺癌检出率，同时减少放射科医生的工作量人工智能支持的乳房X光检查显着提高了乳腺癌检出率，同时保持了可比的召回率，为解决放射科医生的工作量提供了更安全、更有效的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-boosts-breast-cancer-detection-rates-while-cutting-radiograph-workload.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-boosts-breast-cancer-detection-rates-while-cutting-radiograph-workload.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea803c28-f87a-462e-a4a7-cd3ae9882b5a Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:43:00 -0500 AI boosts breast cancer detection rates while cutting radiologist workload
限时饮食可与地中海饮食相媲美，但在内脏脂肪减少方面效果不佳限时饮食（TRE）对于体重管理来说是安全可行的，但与地中海饮食相比，在减少内脏脂肪方面并没有额外的好处。早期 TRE 在减少皮下脂肪和改善空腹血糖水平方面显示出希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Time-restricted-eating-rivals-Mediterranean-diet-but-falls-short-for-visceral-fat-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Time-restricted-eating-rivals-Mediterranean-diet-but-falls-short-for-visceral-fat-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=700770c8-cedb-4aa6-b3fc-749986370cef Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:35:00 -0500 Time-restricted eating rivals Mediterranean diet but falls short for visceral fat loss
研究显示社会经济发展对全球癌症负担的影响癌症仍然是一个重大的公共卫生挑战，GLOBOCAN 2020 报告估计全球将有 1930 万新癌症病例和 1000 万癌症相关死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-shows-the-impact-of-socioeconomic-development-on-global-cancer-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-shows-the-impact-of-socioeconomic-development-on-global-cancer-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42223f98-bde9-4a5c-88b3-859366f79be6 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:07:00 -0500 Study shows the impact of socioeconomic development on global cancer burden
斯坦福大学研究人员开发人工智能模型来增强癌症预后预测视觉信息（例如显微镜和 X 射线图像、CT 和 MRI 扫描）与文本（考试笔记、不同专业医生之间的沟通）的融合是癌症护理的关键组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Stanford-researchers-develop-AI-model-to-enhance-cancer-prognosis-predictions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Stanford-researchers-develop-AI-model-to-enhance-cancer-prognosis-predictions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69ad9ebe-df61-4a73-8dc1-2d84f3fe29c8 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:02:57 -0500 Stanford researchers develop AI model to enhance cancer prognosis predictions
新的脑干细胞发现可能会带来更好的胶质母细胞瘤治疗方法大脑中新型干细胞的发现可能会为最致命的脑肿瘤带来更好的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-brain-stem-cell-discovery-could-usher-in-better-treatments-for-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-brain-stem-cell-discovery-could-usher-in-better-treatments-for-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4972d99e-6de8-45b2-a3ec-b696fe721729 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:57:16 -0500 New brain stem cell discovery could usher in better treatments for glioblastoma
新的纳米平台结合了焦亡和铁死亡以增强癌症治疗光免疫疗法是一种创新的癌症治疗方法，将光疗与免疫疗法相结合，选择性地靶向并破坏癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-nanoplatform-combines-pyroptosis-and-ferroptosis-for-enhanced-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-nanoplatform-combines-pyroptosis-and-ferroptosis-for-enhanced-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1017821-b1ab-4ef7-8432-5d8f787c3222 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:51:36 -0500 New nanoplatform combines pyroptosis and ferroptosis for enhanced cancer treatment
